DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim determine effect negative-calorie diet supplement exercise , weight loss lipid profile , compare efficiency low-calorie diet exercise among elderly adult woman abnormal weight gain .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Choice Active Older Adult Women
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Negative-calorie diet among popular diet guide weight loss ; however , still little knowledge method . Objectives : The present study aim determine effect negative-calorie diet supplement exercise , weight loss lipid profile , compare efficiency low-calorie diet exercise among elderly adult woman abnormal weight gain . Material Methods : Participants include sedentary woman ( age 45-75 year ) overweight obesity ( n=111 ) . They randomly divide two group include negative calorie diet exercise , low-calorie diet exercise . Of 111 participant , 90 person complete treatment . The weight assessment parameter include change weight body composition , blood sample test perform pre- three month post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: Nonsmokers weightstable ( Â± 2 kg , one year ) history regular exercise least three month study . History CVD disorder diabetes , depression , eat disorder , chronic medication , kidney disease , cancer , food allergy intolerances item use meal . Subjects abnormality thyroid Electrocardiograph , history antiobesity medication weight loss drug dietary supplementation weight control .
